user.title: Set up SMARTi
user.description: Select the version of SMARTi you want to configure. You can select the Basic og Pro version. Read more about the differences at our repo

basic_token_choice.title: Basic Version: Token Configuration and setup

data.has_token: Already received your token? Please click the submit button to enter you email and your SMARTi Basic token

generate_token.title: Generate Basic Token
generate_token.description: Enter your email address to generate a token for the Basic version. The token will be sent to your email and will be valid for 30 days upon generation.

basic_token_input.title: Enter Basic Token
basic_token_input.description: Please input the token you have received for the Basic version.

pro_link.title: Purchase SMARTi Pro
pro_link.description: Click the link below to purchase an active subsription to SMARTi Pro: {link}

pro_token_input.title: Enter Pro Token
pro_token_input.description: Input the SMARTi PRO token you received by email after activating SMARTi Pro.

error.invalid_subscription: The provided email does not have an active subscription.
error.token_generation_failed: Failed to generate token. Please try again.
error.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please contact support at support@smarti.dev
